turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order a coffee drink

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Where would you like the coffee ordered.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Starbucks at PSU downtown portland

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: no problem

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: have it ready by 7:45 am

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what drink would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: a tall latte

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of milk would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: non fat

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what about flavoring?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like sugar free vanilla

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes, I would like four shots

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, that means a quad skinny vanilla latte

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: with not too much foam

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, a quad skinny vanilla latte with not too much foam

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: can I have it extra hot?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: thank you. I will pay with my corperate account

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: it will be taken care of
